argumentText:
ARGUMENT
r

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | istsr.1 | |- X = dom R |
| 2 |  | #P_dmeq | |- ( r = R -> dom r = dom R ) |
| 3 | 2, 1 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( r = R -> dom r = X ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_sqxpeqd | |- ( r = R -> ( dom r X. dom r ) = ( X X. X ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_id | |- ( r = R -> r = R ) |
| 6 |  | #P_cnveq | |- ( r = R -> `' r = `' R ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_uneq12d | |- ( r = R -> ( r u. `' r ) = ( R u. `' R ) ) |
| 8 | 4, 7 | #P_sseq12d | |- ( r = R -> ( ( dom r X. dom r ) C_ ( r u. `' r ) <-> ( X X. X ) C_ ( R u. `' R ) ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_df-tsr | |- TosetRel = { r e. PosetRel | ( dom r X. dom r ) C_ ( r u. `' r ) } |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_elrab2 | |- ( R e. TosetRel <-> ( R e. PosetRel /\ ( X X. X ) C_ ( R u. `' R ) ) ) |
